sect1.title: Introduction
sect1.para: The &app; application provides access to those settings in GNOME that enable you to use your digital camera from within GNOME applications.

sect1.title: The Main Window
sect1.para: The main window of the &app; application displays a list of currently configured cameras. This list can be modified using three buttons:

itemizedlist.listitem: To add a new camera to the list, click Add.
To display all settings of a camera in the list, select the camera and click Edit.
If you don't use a configured camera any more and would like to remove it from the list, select this camera and click Remove.
